text: Albahaca may refer to: * Ocimum campechianum ("albahaca de monte"), widespread across the Americas from Mexico southward. * Ocimum basilicum, which is the basil ingredient for cooking, grown worldwide. Tuesday, 18 June 2019 * Celosia virgata, a shrub found in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.
